html:
Lord is exalted. Jehovah possesses eternal life and has "all power" (D&C 132:20). The phrase he dwelleth on high speaks of heaven.

he hath filled Zion with judgment and righteousness. Elsewhere Isaiah taught that "Zion shall be redeemed with judgment [justice] and her converts with righteousness" (1:27). The Psalmist wrote, "Righteousness and judgment [justice] are the habitation of [God's] throne" (Ps. 97:2).
